task.title: Making Nestle Chocolate Chip Cookies
task.shortdesc: Test. Follow the steps below to make the original Nestle Toll House chocolate chip cookie.

step.cmd: Combine flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl.
Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla extract in large mixer bowl until creamy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.

ol.li: Add 2 teaspoons water with flour and reduce both granulated sugar and brown sugar to 2/3 cup each.
Bake drop cookies for 8 to 10 minutes.
